value.stringValue: {"mentions":[],"message":"@[{![Opportunity].Owner.DSA_FSS__c}] Opportunity - {![Opportunity].Name}'s Status changed from Sold-Submitted to Sold-Revenue Recognized."}

actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A1

value.stringValue: @[{!myVariable_current.Owner.DSA_FSS__c}] Opportunity - {!myVariable_current.Name}'s Status changed from Sold-Submitted to Sold-Revenue Recognized.

rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Check for Status change not made by DSA/FSS

value.stringValue: ( ([Opportunity].RecordType.Name = "PEO Opportunity Record Type") || ([Opportunity].RecordType.Name = "PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName) && (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Revenue Recognition")) && (TEXT(PRIORVALUE([Opportunity].StageName)) = "Sold - Submitted") && ([Opportunity].Owner.DSA_FSS__c) != null && ([Opportunity].Owner.DSA_FSS__c.Username) != $User.Username

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: ( ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PEO Opportunity Record Type") || ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}) && (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Revenue Recognition")) && (TEXT(PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.StageName})) = "Sold - Submitted") && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.DSA_FSS__c}) != null && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.DSA_FSS__r.Username}) != {!$User.Username}

value.stringValue: ( ([Opportunity].RecordType.Name = "PEO Opportunity Record Type") || ([Opportunity].RecordType.Name = "PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED([Opportunity].CloseDate) && NOT(ISNULL([Opportunity].CloseDate)) && ([Opportunity].Owner.DSA_FSS__c) != null && ([Opportunity].Owner.DSA_FSS__c.Username) != $User.Username && ( (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Submitted")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Underwriting")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Revenue Recognition")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Orientation")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Final Underwriting")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Started")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Commissioned")) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: ( ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PEO Opportunity Record Type") || ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.CloseDate}) && NOT(ISNULL({!myVariable_current.CloseDate})) && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.DSA_FSS__c}) != null && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.DSA_FSS__r.Username}) != {!$User.Username} && ( (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Submitted")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Underwriting")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Revenue Recognition")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Orientation")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Final Underwriting")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Started")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Commissioned")) )

value.stringValue: ( ([Opportunity].RecordType.Name = "PEO Opportunity Record Type") || ([Opportunity].RecordType.Name = "PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Amount) && NOT(ISNULL([Opportunity].Amount)) && ([Opportunity].Owner.DSA_FSS__c) != null && ([Opportunity].Owner.DSA_FSS__c.Username) != $User.Username && ( (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Submitted")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Underwriting")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Revenue Recognition")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Orientation")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Final Underwriting")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Started")) || (ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Sold - Commissioned")) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: ( ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PEO Opportunity Record Type") || ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Amount}) && NOT(ISNULL({!myVariable_current.Amount})) && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.DSA_FSS__c}) != null && ({!myVariable_current.Owner.DSA_FSS__r.Username}) != {!$User.Username} && ( (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Submitted")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Underwriting")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Revenue Recognition")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Orientation")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Final Underwriting")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Started")) || (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Sold - Commissioned")) )
